meanings.definition: a group of extinct reptiles known for their simple structure and lack of specialized features.
meanings.sent1: The museum had a fascinating exhibit on cotylosaurs.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the bones of cotylosaurs to learn more about ancient reptiles.
meanings.sent3: The cotylosaurs at the museum were so old, they probably knew the dinosaurs personally!
meanings.sent4: In the world of ancient reptiles, cotylosaurs were the unsung heroes.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the size of the cotylosaurs' fossils.

meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of the cotylosaurs.
meanings.sent1: The researcher presented a detailed report on cotylosaurs anatomy.
meanings.sent2: The cotylosaurs fossils were carefully examined for any unique features.
meanings.sent3: The cotylosaurs-themed party decorations were a hit with the guests.
meanings.sent4: Her room was decorated with cotylosaurs posters and figurines.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit showcased various cotylosaurs artifacts.

meanings.definition: a member of the group of extinct reptiles known as cotylosaurs.
meanings.sent1: The paleontologist discovered a new species of cotylosaurs in the dig site.
meanings.sent2: The cotylosaurs roamed the ancient lands millions of years ago.
meanings.sent3: The cotylosaurs in the picture looked like they were posing for a family portrait.
meanings.sent4: The children's book featured a brave cotylosaurs on an adventure.
meanings.sent5: The documentary explored the daily lives of cotylosaurs in their prime.
